titleStmt.title: Presumption no proof, or, Mr. Petto's arguments for infant-baptism considered and answered and infants interest in the convenant of grace without baptism asserted and maintained : whereunto is prefixed an answer to two questions propounded by Mr. Firmin about infants church-membership and baptism / by Thomas Grantham.
titleStmt.author: Grantham, Thomas, 1634-1692.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
